name: Pulling in Space
description:
A game made for the Black and White Jam №∞+1

Control you Spaceship and reach the goal in this simple game, avoiding asteroids and black holes!

Controls:

Move your cursor to guide the Spaceship. You can control  your ship speed with using the scroll wheel.

Audio used in this game:

https://pastebin.com/QpzfYf1X
